title: #92Noon! Gorg/St Peter/EversonGriffen/Turner
description: Kevin Gorg opens the show from Nashville in front of tonight's Wild game, Twins President Dave St Peter helps up pump up Thursday's Twins season opener, Vikings DE Everson Griffen in studio for two segments, and former Vikes QB coach, current Panthers QB coach Scott Turner calls in to chat more football.
itunes:summary: Kevin Gorg opens the show from Nashville in front of tonight's Wild game, Twins President Dave St Peter helps up pump up Thursday's Twins season opener, Vikings DE Everson Griffen in studio for two segments, and former Vikes QB coach, current Panthers QB coach Scott Turner calls in to chat more football.
